TopicTitle: Actions on the Fly : Edit your action groups in flight mode

Articles.Content:
Here comes the new thread

Actions on the Fly 1.1 (spaceport)

This plugin allows you to edit your action groups while in flight mode. Some people have reported issues using it. It's sometimes hard to find the ship. Switching with brackets keys should not be a problem anymore since 1.1. If you undock a ship from a launcher, and the root part is staying on the launcher, the root part of the new ship will be the docking port. It may be confusing, but it's how the game works. V2 will fix this as it has a new way of working, the plugin won't need to track the active ship anymore. If you still have problem, going back to space center and reloading the ship with Tracking Station usually works well.

How To Use

Right click the root part of your ship and "Enable AG Edit".

You can then right click any part of your ship with the action you want to edit.

Add or remove the action to/from any group(s) you want.

You can then disable the plugin in the root part.

Thank you for any feedback !
